author: Masoom Gupte
title: Satya Nadella's tips for working from home
description: Satya Nadella's tips for working from homeThe Microsoft CEO recently shared the guidelines for employees to follow.
content:
Work from home may be a necessity today but in the post-coronavirus world, remote working may stay. And if that’s the case, it’s time to look at the early lessons, as identified by Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella recently.
More appropriately, Nadella’s colleague… [+2308 chars]
